name: Lost and Alone
description:
Lost and Alone

You start the game as a spaceship captain and you are many to leave the planet because a disater happened. Unfortunately your spaceship has a big problem and you'll be sent out of the way. When you wake up, you realize that you lost the group and you're alone. Your mission is to find them because you don't want to be abandoned and you need their help. 

Time: ~30 minutes

The game is enable for free and has a Secret Ending.
